Title: FLOSS Weekly 723: Freedom to Fork - Open Source Communities & Democracy With Seth Frey
Description:
How open source communities form, fork, and govern themselves are just a few of the many topics UC-Davis professor Seth Frey talks about with Doc Searls and Simon Phipps in an insight-filled show.

Hosts: Doc Searls and Simon Phipps

Guest: Seth Frey

Download or subscribe to this show at https://twit.tv/shows/floss-weekly

Think your open source project should be on FLOSS Weekly? Email floss@twit.tv.
